meta_description: InfraClay3300G sets a new standard in geosynthetics, offering robust stabilization with >3300 g/m² sodium bentonite granules for versatile Australian terrains.
InfraClay3600GL: A superior integration of GCL with PE Liner, featuring sodium bentonite granules for unparalleled soil stabilization and waterproofing.
InfraClay3700G: Innovating Australian geosynthetics with >3700 g/m² sodium bentonite granules GCL, offering unparalleled performance in soil stabilization.
InfraClay3700GL: Elevating GCL solutions with a PE Liner. A robust GCL Geosynthetic Clay Liner, uniquely integrated with a waterproof liner for superior protection.
InfraClay4000G revolutionises geosynthetic solutions with >4000 g/m² sodium bentonite granules, offering unrivalled GCL performance for diverse Australian projects.
Discover InfraClay4000P – a superior GCL with >4000 g/m² sodium bentonite powder, designed for robust and efficient soil stabilization in Australian terrains.
InfraSealHS is a high-performance smooth HDPE liner for Australian conditions.
